name: EasyScreenCast
description:
This extension simplifies the use of the video recording function integrated in gnome shell, allows quickly to change the various settings of the desktop recording.

SOURCE CODE ->  http://github.com/iacopodeenosee/EasyScreenCast

VIDEO ->  https://youtu.be/81E9AruraKU

**NOTICE**
if an error occurs during the update is recommended to reload GNOME Shell (Alt + F2, 'r') and reload the extension's installation page.
